backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Resume type and tailorResume function that filters work experience and scores/sorts skills based on job description matches, plus blob storage mixin and unused createResume function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features related to creating a home page with call-to-action button, routing setup, and compelling design for the resume tailoring application.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing the TanStack Router setup, feature-based architecture with tailor workflow, PDF extraction/generation, resume parsing, and UI components with re-export wrappers for backward compatibility.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH-based color system with CSS custom properties for light and dark modes, using neutral ink/paper aesthetic for professional resume application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, structured data, favicon references, and CDN scripts for PDF.js (text extraction) and jsPDF (PDF generation).
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router defining Layout component (header with logo, footer with Caffeine.ai attribution) and two routes: HomePage at '/' and TailorResumePage at '/tailor'.
Dialog component providing step-by-step Internet Computer deployment instructions including prerequisites, build commands, dfx deployment, and custom domain setup guidance.
frontend/src/components/ResumeInputs.tsx: Re-export wrapper forwarding to features/tailor/components/ResumeInputs for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/components/ResumePreview.ts: Re-export wrapper forwarding to features/tailor/components/ResumePreview for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/features/tailor/components/: Input component for uploading resume files (PDF/TXT) or pasting text, with progress tracking for PDF extraction. Handles file reading, text extraction, and displays extraction progress with stage-based feedback.

Displays a formatted preview of a Resume object with sections for languages, work experience, education, skills, certificates, and career objectives. Uses icons and consistent styling for each section.
Full-screen component for previewing and downloading the tailored resume as a PDF. Provides back navigation to editing mode and handles PDF generation with loading states.
frontend/src/features/tailor/hooks/useTa: React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor's tailorResume method with base resume and job description. Handles validation and error messaging for the tailoring operation.
frontend/src/features/tailor/index.ts: Barrel export file that re-exports TailorResumePage as the public API of the tailor feature.
frontend/src/features/tailor/lib/resumeP: Parses plain text resume content into a structured Resume object by detecting section headers and organizing content into fields like name, education, skills, and work experience. Handles various text formats with fallback logic.
frontend/src/features/tailor/TailorResum: Main page component for resume tailoring that manages state for base resume, job description, and tailored output. Switches between edit mode and download preview mode, handles validation, and orchestrates the tailoring workflow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes due to authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useTailorResumeMutati: Re-export wrapper for backward compatibility that delegates to the actual implementation in the tailor feature directory.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components like sidebar, cards, buttons, and charts.
frontend/src/lib/resumeParsing.ts: Re-export wrapper for backward compatibility that delegates to the actual resume parsing implementation in the tailor feature directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component with hero section, CTA button to navigate to tailor page, and three value proposition cards highlighting AI-powered resume optimization features.
frontend/src/shared/lib/index.ts: Shared utility functions including date formatting, text truncation, and debounce helper for generic frontend operations.
frontend/src/shared/lib/pdf/extractPdfTe: Browser-based PDF text extraction using PDF.js library, preserving line structure by analyzing text item positions and handling multi-page documents.
frontend/src/shared/lib/pdf/generateResu: Client-side PDF generation using jsPDF to create professionally formatted resume PDFs with sections for languages, work experience, education, skills, certificates, and career objectives.
frontend/src/shared/types/index.ts: Shared TypeScript types for UI components including error states with categorization and loading states with optional messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system with CSS variables, custom font families, border radius utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for a resume tailoring application tracking completed features for a home page with routing and call-to-action button, plus one pending feature request for creating an aesthetic landing page.
